des: "Here is a quick and delicious breakfast that can be enjoyed within minutes. Eating clean never tasted so good! Feel free to add fresh berries to give the dish a little more pizzazz."
ins: Bring water and salt to a boil in a saucepan; add oats and simmer until desired consistency is reached, about 5 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and stir in bananas, sunflower seed butter, and agave nectar.
